TopicTitle: Milestone Reached - 0.23 is Now in Experimentals Phase

Articles.Content:
We're in the home stretch, everyone!

We are pleased to announce the reaching of a new milestone in the development of KSP update 0.23.

Experimentals!

Tests are being made and things are being tightened up in this final phase before release.

Keep an eye out on the forum and all of our other social media outposts for further news.
